name: modern_hardware_constant_optimization
chinese_name: 论现代硬件上的常数优化
author: 宋佳兴
summary: This paper discusses constant optimization techniques on modern hardware, focusing on improving the efficiency of algorithms involving multiplicative functions, Dirichlet convolutions, and power sums. It presents methods to reduce time complexity by leveraging number-theoretic properties such as powerful numbers and optimized sieve techniques, achieving improved complexities like O(√n poly log n) for certain summation problems.
